promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute epic crocodile water-type wearing a white and black crown. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or water. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crockrone, a chibi cute epic crocodile water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: water-pulse, splash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word crocodile or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, crocodile-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sapphire blue galaxy background
generatedDescription: Crockrone is a playful lake dweller, able to leap and splash like no other. Its funny antics delight all that watch!
